text: Ladislav Jirasek (; 24 June 1927 – 31 July 1977) was a German footballer who played for VfB Stuttgart, Bayern Munich, Borussia Neunkirchen and the Saarland national team as a goalkeeper. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:1977 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:Saarland B international footballers Category:VfB Stuttgart players Category:FC Bayern Munich footballers Category:Borussia Neunkirchen players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Sportspeople from Prague
title: Ladislav Jirasek
